channel.title: How does it work?
channel.description: i am not learning java yet (hopefully soon to catch up with the stuff on mopar), and i don't know anything about java, and i want to find a runescape client that lock's compass angle and no random color, and also no random.dat on your computer, basically undetectable, so can any one help me?

item.title: How does it work?
item.dc:creator: @speedster239 speedster239
item.description:
@speedster239 wrote:

Check out scarscape, apparently it locks the compass north, gets rid of the random color and such.

Also, if your interested in actually learning java remain at a safe distance from moparscape, it is the most terrible excuse in existence for any form of programming and bring shame to the language.

Check out http://java.sun.com for tutorials from the basics to advanced or even the official java forums at http://forum.java.sun.com for some more advice on where to get started.

Read full topic
